responses.rationale: The segment reports a factual event without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on past concerns and discoveries without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes potential symptoms without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a specific factual detail about a past case without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on the content of a CDC alert without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a specific factual detail about a past case without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on a CDC action without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on consumer behavior and sales data without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes a mechanism of disease spread without speculating about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports the location of recent cases without speculating about future relief or improvement.
